oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: WSM Radio delayed broadcast of the Country Music Hall of Fame medallion ceremony - 2007-11-05. Tape one of two.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Delayed broadcast by WSM radio of the Country Music Hall of Fame medallion ceremony with tributes and performances of the 2008 ceremony honoring Ernest V. Stoneman from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on May 12, 2008. Delayed broadcast on WSM Radio.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddie Stubbs; Kyle Young; Steve Turner; Vince Gill; Tammy Genovese; Old Crow Medicine Show; The Whites; Cowboy Jack Clement; Patsy Stoneman;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress. (00:00) WSM radio news and weather break / (03:43) Medallion ceremony audio greeting and opening recorded performance / (08:35) Opening comments by Kyle Young / (12:10) Comments from Steve Turner / (14:01) Introduction of Vince Gill who performs Drifting Too Far From The Shore / (19:35) Eddie Stubbs with WSM break in with announcements and commercials / (28:22) Eddie Stubbs interviews Vince Gill during the pre-ceremony festivities / (35:10) WSM announcements and commercial break in / (40:48) Kyle Young continues medallion opening / (44:35) Introduction of CMA's Tammy Genovese with her comments / (45:08) Kyle Young continues opening comments with audience introductions / (48:19) Eddie Stubbs with WSM radio break in / (49:46) Eddie Stubbs interviews Tammy Genovese during the pre-ceremony festivities / (55:55) WSM announcements and commercial break / (58:11) CBS Radio news update / (01:01:41) Kyle Young continues medallion opening /

(01:03:32) Kyle Young begins the Ernest V. Stoneman segment / (01:06:09) Introduction of Old Crow Medicine Show who perform Tell Mother I Will Meet Her / (01:10:31) Eddie Stubbs with WSM radio break in / (01:12:58) Eddie Stubbs interviews The Whites during the pre-ceremony festivities / (01:17:31) Eddie Stubbs with WSM radio announcements and commercials / (01:25:47) Kyle Young continues with the Stoneman segment / (01:31:05) Introduction of Cowboy Jack Clement, Donna, Patsy and Ronnie Stoneman who perform The Titanic / (01:43:26) Eddie Stubbs with WSM radio announcements and commercials / (01:49:54) Kyle Young continues with Stoneman segment / (01:52:15) Introduction of Cowboy Jack Clement who performs Blue Ridge Mountain Blues / (01:55:30) Eddie Stubbs with WSM radio break in with announcements and commercials / END OF TAPE ONE.
